grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities package

Submodules

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.command_is_available module

Return whether given bash command is available in PATH.

param command_name

The command to check availability for.

type command_name

str,

returns

rtype

Boolean representing if the command is available in PATH.

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.get_available_gpus module

Return list with IDs of available GPU devices.

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.get_available_gpus_number module

Return whether GPUs can be detected.

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.has_gpus module

Return whether GPUs can be detected.

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.has_nvidia_drivers module

Return whether NVIDIA drivers can be detected.

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.has_rocm_drivers module

Return whether ROCM drivers can be detected.

grape.embiggen.utils.gpu_utilities.has_single_gpu module

Return whether there is only a GPU available.

Module contents

Submodule with utilities relative to GPU availability.
